column5: Hello All, I just recently purchased my first boat but it is in desperate need of some refinishing.  It is an older 16 ft aluminum with a 9.2 viking.  The motor runs great.  It has been painted twice in the past, but both layers are falling off and it looks terrible.  How do I go about preparing the surface for paint, and what kind of paint, primer should I use?  Thanks
if it's a metal cowling you can use paint stripper to remover the old paint
anyone else have any info on paint types that will withstand the water and a few bumps?
Use an epoxy primer and a single stage paint.
